pr_title: SAK-40672 - Auto Groups Javascript refactor and some minor UI fixes

timeline.bodyText: Looks like there's a label missing for this input. That makes it hard for people using screen readers or voice control to use the input.
timeline.author: accesslint
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -15,7 +15,7 @@
             <th th:text="#{index.table.joinableset}">Joinable set</th>
             <th class="hidden-xs" th:text="#{index.table.groupsize}">Size (Max)</th>
             <th class="hidden-xs" th:text="#{index.table.groupmembers}">Members</th>
-            <th><input type="checkbox" id="selectAllGroups" th:text="| #{index.table.selectallnone}|"/></th>
+            <th><input type="checkbox" id="group-manager-index-select-all" th:text="| #{index.table.selectallnone}|"/></th>

timeline.bodyText: Looks like there's a label missing for this input. That makes it hard for people using screen readers or voice control to use the input.
timeline.author: accesslint
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,7 +23,7 @@
             <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-hover">
             <thead>
               <tr>
-                <th><input type="checkbox" id="selectAllRoles" th:text="| #{autogroups.step1.table.selectallnone}|"/></th>
+                <th><input type="checkbox" id="group-manager-select-all-roles" th:text="| #{autogroups.step1.table.selectallnone}|"/></th>

timeline.bodyText: Looks like there's a label missing for this input. That makes it hard for people using screen readers or voice control to use the input.
timeline.author: accesslint
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -43,7 +43,7 @@
             <table class="table table-hovered table-bordered table-striped">
             <thead>
               <tr>
-                <th><input type="checkbox" id="selectAllSections" th:text="| #{autogroups.step2.table.selectallnone}|" onchange="checkSubmitButton();"/></th>
+                <th><input type="checkbox" id="group-manager-select-all-sections" th:text="| #{autogroups.step2.table.selectallnone}|"/></th>
